name: Days Of Our Lives: October Quiz | Famous Dates | 5 Questions

questions.text: In what year was Sputnik launched by the Soviet Union?
questions.explanation:
1957.

	It had a diameter of 22 inches and weighed 184 pounds. It reached a calculated height of 560 miles.

questions.text: What famous comic actor was born on October 4, 1895?
questions.explanation:
Buster Keaton.

	He was a sad basset faced comic who was said to have been as good as Charlie Chaplin and Harold Lloyd.

questions.text: What comic strip made its debut on October 4, 1931?
questions.explanation:
'Dick Tracy'.

	The 'Dick Tracy' movie was released in 1990 and starred Warren Beatty and Madonna.

questions.text: What singer was found dead in her room on October 4, 1970?
questions.explanation:
Janis Joplin.

	She died of a heroin overdose. She was elected into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 1995.

questions.text: On October 4, 1862, what publication featured a cartoon about General George B. McClellan and the Battle of Antietam?
questions.explanation:
'Harper's Weekly'.

	It pictured him riding into Frederick, Maryland after his Union victory at Antietam.
